member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.DOTweenEditorPreview.Start(System.Action)
member.summary: Starts the update loop of tween in the editor. Has no effect during playMode.
member.param: Eventual callback to call after every update

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.DOTweenEditorPreview.Stop(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stops the update loop and clears the onPreviewUpdated callback.
member.param: If TRUE also resets the tweened objects to their original state. Note that this works by calling Rewind on all tweens, so it will work correctly only if you have a single tween type per object and it wasn't killed
If TRUE also kills any cached tween

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.DOTweenEditorPreview.PrepareTweenForPreview(DG.Tweening.Tween,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Readies the tween for editor preview by setting its UpdateType to Manual plus eventual extra settings.
member.param: If TRUE prevents the tween from being auto-killed at completion
If TRUE starts playing the tween immediately

member.name: F:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorVersion.Version
member.summary: Full major version + first minor version (ex: 2018.1f)

member.name: F:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorVersion.MinorVersion
member.summary: First minor version (ex: in 2018.1 it would be 1)

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorUtils.SetEditorTexture(UnityEngine.Texture2D,UnityEngine.FilterMode,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks that the given editor texture use the correct import settings, and applies them if they're incorrect.

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorUtils.DOTweenSetupRequired
member.summary: Returns TRUE if setup is required

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorUtils.AssetExists(System.String)
member.summary: Returns TRUE if the file/directory at the given path exists.
member.param: Path, relative to Unity's project folder

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorUtils.ADBPathToFullPath(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given project-relative path to a full path, with backward (\) slashes).

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorUtils.FullPathToADBPath(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given full path to a path usable with AssetDatabase methods (relative to Unity's project folder, and with the correct Unity forward (/) slashes).

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorUtils.ConnectToSourceAsset``1(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Connects to a asset. If the asset already exists at the given path, loads it and returns it. Otherwise, either returns NULL or automatically creates it before loading and returning it (depending on the given parameters).
member.param: File path (relative to Unity's project folder)
If TRUE and the requested asset doesn't exist, forces its creation

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorUtils.GetAssemblyFilePath(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Full path for the given loaded assembly, assembly file included

member.name: M:DG.DOTweenEditor.EditorUtils.RemoveGlobalDefine(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given global define if it's present
